1010101011111110 1011000111011100 1 -> sum: 0101110011011011, cout: 1
1100100101010110 0100011100111111 1 -> sum: 0001000010010110, cout: 1
0000110010010011 0101000011101000 1 -> sum: 0101110101111100, cout: 0
1110010010111000 0000100001111011 0 -> sum: 1110110100110011, cout: 0
1100001100000100 0011101100010011 1 -> sum: 1111111000011000, cout: 0
1010111101001011 1011111000000101 0 -> sum: 0110110101010000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
